Blog.post: sorry i kept replying late and all those..i didnt see ur msgs today..and i was in the classroom w NO reception for maths..=S GREAT choice tan koon ee..juz great..wait till i complain to paik poh leong in his friendster ah..hahax..today quite alright..rch hm late..coz went to eat after the maths at JP then they started playing something lyk guessing game in KFC! =S juz 2 games though..hahax..it was lyk so crowded..and we started all the lame questions and riddles again..hahax...>.
